DOC.brief_summary: Evaluation Safety Water Flosser Gingival Epithelial Tissue Different Pressure Settings
DOC.brief_title: Water Flosser v String Floss v Manual Toothbrush Safety
DOC.detailed_description: This study design add safety data measuring , Oral Soft tissue , Clinical Attachment Levels Probing Pocket Depths different pressure setting different time point 6 week period . Data collect Baseline , 2 week , 4 week 6 week time frame .
DOC.criteria: Written consent prior participation Good general health non smoker Have scorable Ramfjord 's teeth Probing depth > 4mm Ramfjord 's teeth Moderate severe gingivitis Advanced periodontitis Medications impact soft tissue .
